extension.name: System emundus - routing to form if user param is false
extension.author: Hugo Moracchini
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt
extension.description: Redirects a user to a specific URL if he a param in the user object is false.

field.name: url
field.label: URL to redirect to
field.description: The URL to redirect the user to if they have no company.

field.name: user_param
field.label: User parameter name
field.description: The params of the user, if the params is TRUE then the user will be redirected, this param is probably added to the user object by another plugin.
